product_name: Vasque Scree UD Low Hiking Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Waterproof and agile, the Vasque Scree UD Low Hiking Shoes for women keep your feet protected and are surprisingly lightweight, making them great for fast-and-light adventures or worry-free day hikes. Waterproof nubuck leather and nylon mesh uppers create a durable and flexible barrier to keep the elements at bay so your feet stay dry longer. Breathable, waterproof membranes block rain from getting in but let sweat out, keeping you comfortable throughout your hike. Gusseted, padded tongues keep out trail debris and relieve pressure from lacing across instep. Multidensity Phylon EVA midsoles absorb shock, provide cushioning and return energy to feet for superb comfort. Embedded thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance protection and support. Vasque Scree UD Low Hiking Shoes for women boast outsoles with Stealth(R) rubber for extra-grippy traction even in the toughest conditions. Closeout.
short_description: Waterproof and agile, the Vasque Scree UD Low Hiking Shoes for women keep your feet protected and are surprisingly lightweight, making them great for fast-and-light adventures or worry-free day hikes.
